__e: Rather than live on in such poverty and disgrace, he wishes to die honorably by harakiri and asks for permission to use our forecourt.
You know, we may walk 250 miles with no money and, yeah, our feet hurt and we see poverty and pain, but nothing compared to how people in other countries live.
My father spent his whole life trying to get it back, and he died in squalor, begging for assistance from anyone.
I believe the number one source of violence in our world is poverty.
